policymakers.title: How Policymakers Think
policymakers.key_question: If this fails publicly, can I defend it to the Tweede Kamer?
policymakers.implication: The Leiden cluster finding is attractive because it can be framed as 'supporting existing research excellence' (low political risk) rather than 'picking winners' (high political risk).

founders.title: How Founders Think
founders.key_question: Can I hire 3 engineers, meet 10 investors, and still see my kids this week?

lifestyle_vs_exit.description: Not all founders want exits. The 85.9% 'operating' rate includes growth-stage companies, €2M ARR lifestyle businesses, zombies, and pivots.
lifestyle_vs_exit.implication: Don't assume all founders want Series A. Segment by ambition, not just sector.
